charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was hanging out in
town when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] spotted Nate and Ryuki.
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_0200:
OK! That was a nice gig! I expected no less from
a Neo Champion!
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_0300:
You guys showed off some great teamwork
too, Ryuki!
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_0401_0500:
A Pokémon battle, of course! Ryuki and I just had
a REALLY fun one!
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_0402_0700: Yeah! Ryuki and I just had a red-hot battle!
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_0800:
I could feel that you and Haxorus have fiery
spirits, Nate!
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_0900:
Not many people can work with dragon Pokémon
as well as you can!
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_1000:
Wow! It really makes me happy to hear that from
you, Ryuki!
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_1100:
I’m surprised, though. Your Haxorus is acting
totally different now than he was during our gig. 
He's so cool and collected.
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_1200:
During our set, he was as soulful as any dragon
Pokémon—but now? He’s like a whole ’nother
Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_1300:
Yeah, my Haxorus is usually pretty quiet except
during battle—then he gets really intense!
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_1400:
I think it’s awesome that he’s such a tough,
wild fighter!
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_0402_1800: You think I’m kinda like Haxorus?
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_1900:
I guess I do get really focused when I’m taking a
battle seriously.
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_2000:
I never noticed it myself...but you might be right,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Maybe I am kinda
like Haxorus!
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_2100:
Hahaha! Nice! It’s important to have an on-off
switch like that! You’d get real tired if you were
always so soulful!
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_2200:
I’m sure you’re setting a great example for
everyone else, too!
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_2300:
Heh heh... Thanks, you two! I feel more
confident now!
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_2400: By the way...what’s your “off” mode like, Ryuki?
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_0401_2700:
I thought so! It’d be cool to know what a star like
Ryuki does when he’s not going full throttle!
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_0402_2900:
See? [Name:PlayerNickname ] wants to know,
too! Won’t you tell us?
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_3100:
Sorry, even my hardcore fans don’t get to know
stuff like that.
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_3200: What I’m like on my own time is a secret!
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_3400:
But I guess hiding that side of yourself is pretty
cool, actually... Just like a star!
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_3500:
Maybe I’ll try to keep my “off” mode secret too
when I get older...
charaepi_ch0100_90_kyohei/2301_1201_3600: That way, I can be a mysterious Champion!
